page.title: 16STONELEIGH CALF FARM
page.content: This is a smallholding where our main enterprise is calf dealing. We buy calves from markets all over the country,from Preston to Haverfordwest in Wales and many from local farms. We supply to clients throughout England and Scotland, and export a large number to France and Italy. We sell approx 25,000 to 3O,000 calves a year.We run three lorries for the transport of our calves. We also run a small pedigree herd of British Belgian Blue cattle, a comparatively new breed to this country. They are noted for good conformation and docile nature. To increase our herd quickly, we have been doing embryo transplants on our pedigree heifer, which means getting her in calf for one week and then removing the fertilised eggs to implant them in other cows.
